thread.title: At least 2 dead, 70 injured in South Carolina train wreck

title: At least 2 dead, 70 injured in South Carolina train wreck
text:
At least 2 dead, 70 injured in South Carolina train wreck 3:15pm GMT - 01:17 
Emergency workers in South Carolina said two people were killed and scores more injured when an Amtrak train collided with a freight train Sunday morning. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Emergency workers in South Carolina said two people were killed and scores more injured when an Amtrak train collided with a freight train Sunday morning. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.)
